entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS AROUND 50
